amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to direct the Secretary to expand the areas of consideration to include water storage.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Soto.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
